ygData.subject: Re: Level 20 to 24
ygData.msgSnippet: Well if your lucky this spot will still be open.  But last time I went through to check on things it was majorly camped out.  I guess alot of people read this
ygData.messageBody:
Well if your lucky this spot will still be open. But last time I went
through to check on things it was majorly camped out. I guess alot of
people read this Mailing. The magic spot was Lake Rathe. Good Luck.

Shadair J'Axx
26th Wizard
Karana


> Currently i am a level 18 Dark Elf named Damatar on Fennin Ro... i read a
post about someone knowing a GREAT spot and that he was going to level there
fast from 20 to 24 in one weekend or something and he would tell where it
was when he got done leveling .. on monday but this was like 2 weeks ago and
i must of deleted the post because i never found out where this golden spot
was anyone that read the post or the person who posted it would like to
repeat... please tell and if this information cannot be foundt is there any
suggestions on where i should solo and will level fast or somewhere where i
can group and level fast? thanks
